name: Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne Duo Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Aquatics.Key Notes:Ambrette Seeds, Sea Salt, Sage.Set Description:A fresh, mineral, and woody scent with subtle aromatic tones. Spritz on this energizing cologne perfume to be instantly transported to windswept shores with waves breaking white, the air alive with sea salt and spray. A unique fragrance that’s at once sophisticated, lively, and totally joyful..About the Fragrance:A note of ambrette seed opens this uplifting perfume, bringing an aura of sophistication. Sea salt minerality illuminates the heart and herbal sage defines the base with woody aromatic tones, adding a natural depth to the scent..This Set Contains:- 0.34 oz/ 10 mL Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water, Fragrance, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Coumarin, Bht.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Like perfume or eau de toilette, cologne is a fragrance designed to be worn on the skin..-Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points—your body heat will help to diffuse the scent as the day goes on..-After applying your cologne, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.  .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace your fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.
